verses.verse: When I would <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> then the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> also the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> for they <S%H6466>commit<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and the <S%H1590>thief<s%> enters <S%H935>in,<s%> and the <S%H1416>gang<s%> of robbers <S%H6584>ravages<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>

They <S%H559>don't<s%> consider in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> that I <S%H2142>remember<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%> Now their own <S%H4611>deeds<s%> have <S%H5437>engulfed<s%> <S%H6440>them.<s%> They are before my face.
They make the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> with their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> with their <S%H3585>lies.<s%>

They are all <S%H5003>adulterers.<s%> They are <S%H1197>burning<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven<s%> that the <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7673>stops<s%> <S%H5782>stirring,<s%> from the <S%H3888>kneading<s%> of the <S%H1217>dough,<s%> until it is <S%H2556>leavened.<s%>

On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of our <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> made themselves <S%H2470>sick<s%> with the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of <S%H3196>wine.<s%> He <S%H4900>joined<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with <S%H3945>mockers.<s%>

For they have <S%H7126>prepared<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> while they lie in <S%H693>wait.<s%> Their <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H3463>sleeps<s%> all the <S%H3915>night.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H1197>burns<s%> as a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

They are all <S%H2552>hot<s%> as an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> their <S%H8199>judges.<s%> All their <S%H4428>kings<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen.<s%> There is no one among them who calls to <S%H7121>me.<s%>
<S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> he <S%H1101>mixes<s%> himself among the <S%H5971>nations.<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is a <S%H5692>pancake<s%> not turned <S%H2015>over.<s%>

<S%H2114>Strangers<s%> have <S%H398>devoured<s%> his <S%H3581>strength,<s%> and he <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> realize <S%H7872>it.<s%> Indeed, gray hairs are here and <S%H2236>there<s%> on <S%H3045>him,<s%> and he doesn't realize it.

The <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>testifies<s%> to his <S%H6440>face;<s%> yet they <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> nor sought <S%H1245>him,<s%> for all this.

<S%H669>"Ephraim<s%> is like an easily <S%H6601>deceived<s%> <S%H3123>dove,<s%> without <S%H3820>understanding.<s%> They <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> They <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

When they <S%H3212>go,<s%> I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> on <S%H3381>them.<s%> I will bring them down like the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> <S%H5712>them,<s%> as their congregation has <S%H8088>heard.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H5074>them!<s%> For they have wandered from <S%H7701>me.<s%> Destruction to <S%H6586>them!<s%> For they have trespassed against <S%H6299>me.<s%> Though I would redeem <S%H1696>them,<s%> yet they have spoken lies against <S%H3577>me.<s%>

They <S%H2199>haven't<s%> cried to me with their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but they <S%H3213>howl<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds.<s%> They <S%H1481>assemble<s%> themselves for <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine.<s%> They turn away from <S%H5493>me.<s%>
Though I have <S%H3256>taught<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H2220>arms,<s%> yet they <S%H2803>plot<s%> evil against <S%H7451>me.<s%>

They <S%H7725>return,<s%> but not to the Most <S%H5920>High.<s%> They are like a <S%H7423>faulty<s%> <S%H7198>bow.<s%> Their <S%H8269>princes<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H2195>rage<s%> of their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%> <S%H2097>This<s%> will be their <S%H3933>derision<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
